comments:
Build:  N20050620
To repro:
1.  Create a new EAR project (no modules need to be created)
2.  File | New | EJB Project
3.  Give project a name and in Advanced section, select that you want to add it
to the EAR you created in step 1
4.  Click OK

Results:
An error message that "An error has occurred when New EJB Project finished" with
the following stack trace:

released the code for that.

Confirmed fixed on latest I20050712.
Tested EJB project, connector project, and web project
